search.query: | inputlookup cs_device_master_table | search $tkn_sp_filter$ | eval lansweeper_os =AssetType." ".OSVersion." ".AssetVersion | eval os=coalesce(tenable_os, QUALYS_OS, lansweeper_os) | eval mac_address=mvappend(lansweeper_mac_address, crowdstrike_mac_address) | eval user=mvappend(lansweeper_user, sophos_user, crowdstrike_user) | eval lansweeper_status=case(isnull(lansweeper_last_event), "-", 1==1, AssetState) | eval qualys_status=case(isnull(qualys_last_event), "-", ACTIVE_SEVERITY_5>0, "Red", ACTIVE_SEVERITY_4>0, "Orange", ACTIVE_SEVERITY_3>0, "Yellow", 1==1, "Green") | eval tenable_status=case(isnull(tenable_last_event), "-", critical_active_vuln>0, "Red", high_active_vuln>0, "Orange", medium_active_vuln>0, "Yellow", 1==1, "Green") | eval defender_status=case(isnull(defender_last_event), "-", 1==1, RTP_state) | eval sophos_status=case(isnull(sophos_last_event), "-", isnull(sophos_status), "RTP Enabled", 1==1, sophos_status) | eval crowdstrike_status=if(isnull(crowdstrike_last_event), "-", "Present")

| stats sum(lansweeper_last_event) as lansweeper, sum(qualys_last_event) as qualys, sum(tenable_last_event) as tenable, sum(sophos_last_event) as sophos, sum(defender_last_event) as defender, sum(crowdstrike_last_event) as crowdstrike | eval lansweeper=if(lansweeper>0, ", lansweeper_status", ""), qualys=if(qualys>0, ", qualys_status, ACTIVE, TOTAL_VULNS", ""), tenable=if(tenable>0, ", tenable_status, active_vuln, total_vuln", ""), sophos=if(sophos>0, ", sophos_status", ""), defender=if(defender>0, ", defender_status", ""), crowdstrike=if(crowdstrike>0, ", crowdstrike_status", "")

| inputlookup cs_device_master_table | stats count as Total, sum(eval(if(lansweeper_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as Lansweeper, sum(eval(if(qualys_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as Qualys, sum(eval(if(tenable_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as Tenable, sum(eval(if(defender_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as Defender, sum(eval(if(sophos_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as Sophos, sum(eval(if(crowdstrike_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as Crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(lansweeper_last_event>0 AND qualys_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as lansweeper_qualys, sum(eval(if(lansweeper_last_event>0 AND tenable_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as lansweeper_tenable, sum(eval(if(lansweeper_last_event>0 AND defender_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as lansweeper_defender, sum(eval(if(lansweeper_last_event>0 AND sophos_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as lansweeper_sophos, sum(eval(if(lansweeper_last_event>0 AND crowdstrike_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as lansweeper_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(qualys_last_event>0 AND tenable_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as qualys_tenable, sum(eval(if(qualys_last_event>0 AND sophos_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as qualys_sophos, sum(eval(if(qualys_last_event>0 AND defender_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as qualys_defender, sum(eval(if(qualys_last_event>0 AND crowdstrike_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as qualys_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(tenable_last_event>0 AND sophos_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as tenable_sophos, sum(eval(if(tenable_last_event>0 AND defender_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as tenable_defender, sum(eval(if(tenable_last_event>0 AND crowdstrike_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as tenable_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(sophos_last_event>0 AND defender_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as sophos_defender, sum(eval(if(sophos_last_event>0 AND crowdstrike_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as sophos_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(defender_last_event>0 AND crowdstrike_last_event>0, 1, 0))) as defender_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(((lansweeper_last_event>0) AND (tenable_last_event>0 OR qualys_last_event>0) AND (sophos_last_event>0 OR defender_last_event>0 OR crowdstrike_last_event>0)), 1, 0))) as All, sum(eval(if((tenable_last_event>0 OR qualys_last_event>0), 1, 0))) as Vulnerability_Scanner, sum(eval(if((sophos_last_event>0 OR defender_last_event>0 OR crowdstrike_last_event>0), 1, 0))) as Antivirus | eval No_Lansweeper=Total-Lansweeper, No_Qualys=Total-Qualys, No_Tenable=Total-Tenable, No_Sophos=Total-Sophos, No_Defender=Total-Defender, No_Crowdstrike=Total-Crowdstrike, No_Antivirus=Total-Antivirus, No_Vulnerability_Scanner=Total-Vulnerability_Scanner

html.p: Device Master Table generator report needs to be enabled.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" title="Device Master Table Gen" | table title, disabled | rename title as label | eval status=if(disabled=1, "Report is disabled", "Report is enabled") | table label, status

format.colorPalette: {"Data Present": #03991a, "Data Not Present": #a3030b, "Report is enabled": #03991a, "Report is disabled": #a3030b}

html.p: Description: The total amount of devices detected.
Note - Click on any of the surrounding bar charts to view more information about specific devices in the Device Master Table. Click on the number above to reset the filter.

chart.title: Number of Devices That Are Connected To A Specific Security Component

search.query: | table Total, Lansweeper, Qualys, Tenable, Sophos, Defender, Crowdstrike

html.p: Description: The total amount of devices that are connected to a particular security component.

chart.title: Number of Devices That Contain A Specific Security Component

search.query: | table Total, All, Lansweeper, Vulnerability_Scanner, Antivirus

condition.set: ((lansweeper_last_event=*) AND (tenable_last_event=* OR qualys_last_event=*) AND (sophos_last_event=* OR defender_last_event=* OR crowdstrike_last_event=*))

html.p: Description: No. of devices connected with given connectivity. Lansweeper -> Device present in Lansweeper. Vulnerability Scanner -> Device has any of the vulnerability scanner (Qualys or Tenable). Antivirus -> Device has any of the antivirus (Sophos, Defender, CrowdStrike). All -> Lansweeper, Vulnerability Scanner and Antivirus present.

chart.title: Number of Devices That Lack A Specific Security Component

html.p: Description: No. of devices not connected with given connectivity. Lansweeper -> Device not present in Lansweeper. Vulnerability Scanner -> Device has none of the vulnerability scanner (Qualys or Tenable). Antivirus -> Device has none of the antivirus (Sophos, Defender, CrowdStrike).

search.query: table host, ip, os, mac_address, user $tkn_tablefields_lansweeper$ $tkn_tablefields_qualys$ $tkn_tablefields_tenable$ $tkn_tablefields_sophos$ $tkn_tablefields_defender$ $tkn_tablefields_crowdstrike$ lansweeper_user sophos_user crowdstrike_user | search $tkn_host$ $tkn_ip$ $tkn_user$ $tkn_mac$

html.p: "-"(hyphen) means data not present in that category for that host.
Table will automatically hide columns for which no device has data.

Qualys Status: Red if there is any severity 5 (Urgent) active vulnerability, Orange if there is any severity 4 (Critical) active vulnerability, Yellow if there is any severity 3 (Serious) active vulnerability, Green if there is no Urgent, Critical or Serious active vulnerabilities present.

Tenable Status: Red if there is any critical active severity vulnerability, Orange if there is any high active severity vulnerability, Yellow if there is any medium active severity vulnerability, Green if there is no critical, high or medium active vulnerabilities present.
